title: People pray outside Rome's Gemelli hospital as Pope's condition 'remains critical' | National | insidenova.com
text:
People pray outside Rome's Gemelli hospital as Pope's condition 'remains critical'
- Giovanni GREZZI
- Updated
0
Tags
As featured on
Pope Francis's condition "remains critical", the Vatican said Sunday on his 10th day in hospital as Catholics around the world prayed for the 88-year-old's recovery.
